TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NamedPipeClientStream extends System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream
Public NotInheritable Class NamedPipeClientStream Inherits PipeStream
public ref class NamedPipeClientStream sealed : System::IO::Pipes::PipeStream

summary.span: Exposes a around a named pipe, which supports both synchronous and asynchronous read and write operations.

span.span: Exposes a around a named pipe, which supports both synchronous and asynchronous read and write operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名的管道的管道服务器与一个或多个管道客户端之间的通信提供单向或双工管道。Named pipes provide one-way or duplex pipes for communication between a pipe server and one or more pipe clients. 命名的管道可以用于进程间通信，本地或通过网络。Named pipes can be used for interprocess communication locally or over a network. 可以由多个共享单个管道名称对象。A single pipe name can be shared by multiple objects. 任何进程可以充当一个命名的管道服务器和/或客户端。Any process can act as either a named pipe server or client, or both. > [!NOTE] > 有关[!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/includes/winxppro-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/includes/win2kserver-md.md)]，最多 10 个管道可以同时通过网络连接。For [!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/includes/winxppro-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/includes/win2kserver-md.md)], a maximum of 10 pipes can simultaneously connect over the network. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何从父进程的字符串发送到相同计算机使用命名管道上的子进程。The following example demonstrates a way to send a string from a parent process to a child process on the same computer using named pipes. 此示例将创建父进程中的对象。This example creates a object in a parent process. 对象具有值。The object has a value of . 服务器然后等待中连接到它的子进程对象。The server then waits for a object in a child process to connect to it. 在此示例中，这两个进程都位于同一台计算机上和对象具有值。In this example, both processes are on the same computer and the object has a value of . 接下来，父进程将用户提供的字符串发送给子进程。The parent process then sends a user-supplied string to the child process. 字符串显示到控制台。The string is displayed to the console. 此示例适用于客户端过程中，连接到的服务器进程。This example is for the client process, which connects to the server process. 有关完整的代码示例中，包括代码管道客户端和服务器，请参阅[如何： 使用命名管道进行网络进程间通信](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-use-named-pipes-for-network-interprocess-communication.md)。For the entire code sample, including the code for both the pipe client and server, see [How to: Use Named Pipes for Network Interprocess Communication](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-use-named-pipes-for-network-interprocess-communication.md). [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1/vb/program.vb#01)]

summary.span: Connects to a waiting server with an infinite time-out value.

span.span: Connects to a waiting server with an infinite time-out value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用具有无限超时值的方法。This method calls the method with an infinite time-out value. 此方法等待管道实例变得可用。This method waits for a pipe instance to become available. 可能会返回之前从调用对象，但不会返回直到已返回。 might return before is called from the object, but will not return until has returned. 写入到管道后的任何数据对象已连接，但在服务器具有调用之前，将可供之后调用服务器。Any data written to the pipe after a object has connected, but before the server has called , will be available to the server following the call to . ## Examples 下面的示例演示将从父进程的字符串发送到子进程，使用命名管道的方法。The following example demonstrates a method to send a string from a parent process to a child process using named pipes. 此示例将创建子进程，然后连接到本地计算机上的一个管道中的对象。This example creates a object in a child process, which then connects to a pipe on the local computer. 服务器示例所示类。The server example can be seen in the class. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供和类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the and classes. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1/vb/program.vb#01)]

summary.span: Connects to a waiting server within the specified time-out period.

span.span: Connects to a waiting server within the specified time-out period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法等待管道实例变得可用。This method waits for a pipe instance to become available. 可能会返回之前从调用，但不会返回直到已返回。 might return before is called from the , but will not return until has returned. 你设置`timeout`参数用于指定无限超时值。You set the `timeout` parameter to to specify an infinite time-out value. 写入到管道后的任何数据对象已连接，但在服务器具有调用之前，将可供之后调用服务器。Any data written to the pipe after a object has connected, but before the server has called , will be available to the server following the call to .

summary.span: Gets the number of server instances that share the same pipe name.

span.span: Gets the number of server instances that share the same pipe name.

value.span: 共享同一管道名称的服务器实例的数量。

span.span: The number of server instances that share the same pipe name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的服务器实例数对象当前对象具有的句柄或连接到。This property returns the number of server instances for the object that the current object has a handle to or is connected to. 如果当前对象尚未连接到命名的管道服务器，或如果未设置当前管道句柄，此属性将引发。If the current object has not yet connected to a named pipe server, or if the current pipe handle has not yet been set, this property throws an . ## Examples 下面的示例演示将从父进程的字符串发送到子进程，使用命名管道的方法。The following example demonstrates a method to send a string from a parent process to a child process using named pipes. 在此示例中，在子进程，然后连接到本地计算机上的一个管道中创建对象。In this example, a object is created in a child process, which then connects to a pipe on the local computer. 服务器示例所示类。The server example can be seen in the class. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供和类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the and classes. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1/vb/program.vb#01)]

exception.span: The pipe handle has not been set.

span.span: The pipe handle has not been set.

exception.span: -or- The current object has not yet connected to a object.

span.span: -or- The current object has not yet connected to a object.

exception.span: The pipe is broken or an I/O error occurred.

span.span: The pipe is broken or an I/O error occurred.

exception.span: The underlying pipe handle is closed.

span.span: The underlying pipe handle is closed.
